changelog: Set GPU throttling to 2 on battery profile (More aggressive thermal throttling)
Tweak bus_split per profile settings (Reduces latency)
Tweak force_no_nap per profile settings (Improves gaming performance)
Tweak min_granularity_ns per profile settings (Reduces latency)
Tweak wakeup_granularity_ns per profile settings (Reduces latency)
Dynamically adjust perf_cpu_time_max_percent based on core count
